name: Blackout Z
description:
Blackout Z is a top down arena game, were you must survive a zombie crowd, avoid deadly saws, while your lantern's battery is slowly dying. 

Keys:
WASD - Move player
Mouse - Aim
LMB - Shoot

Made in only 72 hours for Ludum Dare 39;

For more info and updates about this game and any other that I'm making, please follow me on Twitter: http://bit.ly/NukTwitter
